ygData.subject: Re: Unfair?
ygData.msgSnippet: I was in Beta 3 and 4 and it was there even then. ... From: Garret Albritton  To: eq_wizards@onelist.com  Date:
ygData.messageBody:
I was in Beta 3 and 4 and it was there even then.
-----Original Message-----
From: Garret Albritton <defender@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 6:49 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Unfair?


>From: Garret Albritton <defender@...>
>
>
>thats has always been there. It just doesnt happen often unless you get to
>higher levels. At lvl 12 I see it occur maybe 1 out of every 25 to 30
>interrupts, and even then only if im fighting greens and low level blues
>
>
>
>At 10:43 AM 4/27/99 -0500, you wrote:
>>From: "John Penman" <jpenman@...>
>>
>>Well I think they have taken some of this in to consideration because it
>>seems they added somehting new to last nights patch. During the game last
>>night I received a message while in combat taht stated "You regained
>>concentration" and it cast my spells after it told me I lost
concentration.
>>Could be the first steps...? Who knows.
>>
>>Shadair
>>
>>
>>
>>
